title: Bighorn!
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Wilderness areas - United States

description: Focuses on problems facing wildlife and wilderness areas in the United States. Gives the history of the Rocky Mountain bighorn sheep and describes its relationship to its environment. This film was made with the assistance of Yellowstone National Park, Glacier National Park and Grand Teton National Park.
